value.title: Taiwan's Foxconn Predicts Huge Growth In AI Server Business
value.excerpt: Taiwanese tech giant and key Apple supplier Foxconn predicts three-digit growth for its artificial intelligence server business due to robust demand for AI products such as ChatGPT, its chairman said Wednesday.
